name: Nyctophobia (itch) (ShiftyCircuits, ShadowAranea, Isa van den Bosch, Ragone, wrxth, milandb)
name_original: Nyctophobia (itch) (ShiftyCircuits, ShadowAranea, Isa van den Bosch, Ragone, wrxth, milandb)
description:
Feedback : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1F-oEYOypMlJMOgpiVik3cxLDxql59CRiUcYQeuFVKTY/edit?usp=sharing

Find 3 keys to escape through the door, but beware of the fast creatures in the maze.

WASD for movement and Shift to run.
Use E to interact. With interacting you can grab keys, interact with the escape door or even make you hide in a closet to escape from the vision of the creatures.

Version 0.1 - Prototype - "Playable Prototype for feedback to improve the game experience and feel. Files are also accidentally called "Alpha" instead of Prototype" - 24th of November 2021

Version 0.2 - Alpha - "Playable Alpha update with smoother and more balanced gameplay, improving the overal experience and making your goal more clear" - 1st of December 2021

Version 0.3 - Beta - "New map and further balance improvements" - 14th/15th of Januari 2022

Version 0.3.2 - Beta (Fixed) - "The game had some awful bugs that had to get fixed soon after release, and now it's fully playable" - 16th of Januari 2022

Sound from Zapsplat.com & SoundJay.com
